initialMessages.message: Hello! I'm here to help you refine your RFP. What specific aspect would you like to improve?
I need help with the technical requirements section
Great! I can help you structure comprehensive technical requirements. What type of project are you working on?
It's a web application development project

Perfect! Here are key technical requirements you should include:

• Technology stack preferences
• Database requirements
• Performance benchmarks
• Security standards
• Browser compatibility
• API specifications
• Scalability requirements
